TopicTitle: Visual fault in the terrier engine plume

Articles.Content:
KSP2 Version: 0.1.0.0.20892
Operating System: Windows 11
CPU,GPU and RAM: i9 9900KF, RTX 2060 (6GB VRAM), 32GB RAM 
Mods: 0
Description of the problem: The luminous part of the plume inside the engine stays deep inside instead of occupying the entire interior of the engine as in other models.

Image:

https://imgur.com/a/nQEpywV
